abstract.original_text: When bad men combine, the good must associate; else they will fall one by one, an unpitied sacrifice in a contemptible struggle.

sentences.segment_text: When bad men combine , the good must associate ; else they will fall one by one ,
an unpitied sacrifice in a contemptible struggle .

abstract.original_text: The study of this chapter will enable you to:

sentences.segment_text: The study of this chapter will enable you to :

abstract.original_text: 1. Discuss the definitions of terrorism and weapons of mass destruction and their relation to the illicit use of biological agents.

sentences.segment_text: Discuss the definitions of terrorism and weapons of mass destruction and their relation to the illicit use of biological agents .

abstract.original_text: 2. List all legislative and administrative documents that address the legal aspects of the unlawful use of biological agents.

sentences.segment_text: List all legislative and administrative documents that address the legal aspects of the unlawful use of biological agents .

abstract.original_text: 4. Discuss the prohibited uses of biological agents under international law. 5. List and briefly discuss the Homeland Security Presidential Directives that apply to biosecurity and biodefense.

sentences.segment_text: Discuss the prohibited uses of biological agents under international law .
List and briefly discuss the Homeland Security Presidential Directives that apply to biosecurity and biodefense .
